id: Voter Suppression in the Trump Era
paragraph: With midterm elections just 17 days away and early voting already underway, Rev. Al Sharpton speaks with a panel of guests about the attempts at voter suppression that are happening around the country. On the panel are Carrie Sheffield, Tiffany Cross, Darren Sands and OJ Semans.Oct. 20, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
